page.title: 01OUR D-BLOCK
page.content: Our D-block is mainly a residential area with a fairly high concentration of commercial properties and includes the areas of Rosemount,Albyn and Union Street.The majority of buildings are of granite and were built in the 19th century.The exceptions are the new housing and office properties which have been built since the oil boom in the sixties.Much of this development has been in response to the tremendous influx of oil workers.Although much of the harbour area is located in this block we decided to include all the text about it in our adjoining D-block which is predominately sea and harbour. This has therefore allowed us to focus more on the characteristics of the city centre and the residential areas which typify such a large percentage of this D-block.
